text:
So... you know,
it's a bit unsettling to borrow school chairs.

Hm?
Does it remind you of your student days?

Yeah...
and it kind of feels wrong too. I'm in a suit...

Haha, what's that?
You'll get tired standing all the time.

Right, Producer,
I have a little something to discuss about the script──

Oh...
asking the kid next to you to show their textbook, right?
